sentences.english: The obtained value of heterogeneous index with entropy weight method can quantitatively reflect the heterogeneity of reservoir.

sentences.english: Ingredient compounding, uniformization and sterilization are involved in the process.

sentences.english: In this way the coils of clay are completely homogenized and the walls are thinned.
sentences.chinese: 這樣，線圈的粘土是完全均質和牆壁都薄。

sentences.english: It is also effective at homogenizing softer tissues from animals and leaf punches.
